name: linkedin-article-publisher
description: Config-driven LinkedIn Article Publisher using Playwright with Page Object Model

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:ui
scripts.build:cli: npm run build:cli:connect && npm run build:cli:worker
scripts.build:cli:connect: npm run build && pkg cli/li-connect.js --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output cli-dist/li-connect
scripts.build:cli:worker: npm run build && pkg cli/li-worker.js --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output cli-dist/li-worker
scripts.build:cli:mac: npm run build && pkg cli/li-connect.js cli/li-worker.js --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64 --out-path cli-dist
scripts.build:cli:win: npm run build && pkg cli/li-connect.js cli/li-worker.js --targets node18-win-x64 --out-path cli-dist
scripts.build:cli:linux: npm run build && pkg cli/li-connect.js cli/li-worker.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --out-path cli-dist
